title: Norwegian has slashed prices on cheap flights to South America but be quick
text:

Norwegian Air has slashed prices on flights to South America and there are currently some temptingly cheap bargains up for grabs.

The budget carrier is currently offering discounts of up to 15 per cent off flights from London Gatwick to both Rio de Janeiro and Buenos Aires.

The best bit? The deal is valid on its Premium cabin, meaning you'll get to enjoy extra perks such as fast-track security, priority boarding, extra legroom, an in-flight meal and baggage allowance of two checked bags weighing up to 20kg each.

Prices start from £421.80pp for flights to Rio de Janeiro and from £481.30pp for Buenos Aires.

Not sure which of the two cities you'd want to visit first? You may want to check out our Rio de Janeiro guide and our Buenos Aires guide with top tips on the best things to visit, for a dose of inspiration.

The deals are already live on the Norwegian website but you'll need to be quick as the flash sale ends at 11.59pm on Wednesday 23rd October.

(Image: Mikel/Flickr)

To claim the offer you'll need to use the code UKSOUTHAMERICA1943 at checkout to apply the discount.

There's quite a generous window of travel dates on offer too, with the deals valid on flights between the 1st November 2019 through to the 28th March 2020 (perfect timing if you're looking for a bit of winter sun!).

But the discounted flights are not the only deals up for grabs.

(Image: iStockphoto)

Norwegian is also offering up to 15 per cent off holiday packages to Rio de Janeiro, for the same travel dates.

You can book the offer on the Norwegian Holidays website using the code RIOSALE but, like the flights sale, you'll need to do so by 11.59pm on Wednesday 23rd October.

Looking for more travel bargains? You may also want to bookmark our Holiday Deals page and our Cheap Flights page which we regularly update with the latest sales and offers we spot that we think you'll love.
description: Norwegian's latest sale has cheap flights to South America but you'll want to be quick
